welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tempe, where the vibrant college town charm meets the stunning desert landscape. Known for its thriving arts scene, outdoor adventures, and lively nightlife, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
